verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: tweeted] [ARG1: congratulations] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG2: to Republican U.S. Rep. Kevin Cramer] [ARGM-CAU: for his " huge win " in North Dakota 's Senate primary] and included a rare jab at Cramer 's fall opponent , Sen. Heidi Heitkamp .

[ARG2: President Donald Trump] tweeted congratulations Wednesday to Republican U.S. Rep. Kevin Cramer for his " huge win " in North Dakota 's Senate primary and [V: included] [ARG1: a rare jab at Cramer 's fall opponent , Sen. Heidi Heitkamp] .
